alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:27PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Shelby County through 500 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Helena, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Maylene, Joe Tucker Park, Siluria, Alabaster Veterans Park and Saginaw. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
